document_data.name: Muln Horan
document_data.Activities: Muln was a top advisor to General [[Sabine]], and remained in control of a part of the city when the general was busy in other places.
document_data.Personality: Muln hid his feeling for his general with violence.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], he investigated cases of kidnapping. He was with his men at the [[Beached Leviathan]] tavern intimidating an [[adventurer|adventuring band]] that came to be involved in the matter when some [[Ashmadai]] and their bound [[devil]]s attacked. It was only thanks to the adventurers that Muln defeated the enemies. However, he died in the chaos of the subsequent battle.
